stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, they cannot install cards for the remainder of the turn. Subroutine Choose 2 installed Runner cards, if able. The Runner must add 1 of the chosen cards to the top of the stack.
text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, they cannot install cards for the remainder of the turn.
[subroutine] Choose 2 installed Runner cards, if able. The Runner must add 1 of the chosen cards to the top of the stack.
title: Jua
